jobDescription: Join the excitement of Artificial Intelligence in the Cloud at Microsoft! We are a fast-paced data science team in the Cloud Artificial Intelligence Platform Group, building deep learning powered intelligent tools and end-to-end solutions for scenarios in diverse enterprise and consumer verticals. We are looking for a data scientist who is passionate about data and AI and wants to apply machine learning, deep learning techniques to solve real-world problems for enterprises and consumers in text and image AI problems.Responsibilities
